preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 38.00 g of barium, 10.00 g of phosphorus, and 96.00 g of selenium using an analytical balance. 
 2. In a clean, dry mortar and pestle, grind the barium and phosphorus together until a fine powder forms. 
 3. Gradually add the selenium powder to the barium-phosphorus mixture, continuing to grind until all components are homogeneously mixed.
